description: System-generated unique identifier for this record.
Short code identifying the other cost type.
Human-readable description of the other cost type.
Monetary amount associated with the cost type; likely a default or standard amount. Confirm periodicity and currency with SME.
Financial account code used to post this cost in the general ledger.
Free-text notes or remarks about the cost type.
Timestamp when the record was last updated.

Identifier of the user who created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified the record.
Timestamp of the latest user-initiated modification.
